title: Maid desu kara!
sinopse:
"At last, I've come to the fateful place!!"

The heroine Karen Otonashi takes the employment tests for a maid position for the Mitsurugi family, in hopes of becoming a great maid like her grandmother. What will be on the tests given by the Mitsurugi family's handsome "masters"?

(Source: MU)
